name: DunEscape
description:
Mini Game developed for GameDev Insiders Jam #1

No instructions are provided on purpose. Figure it out, definitely more fun that way.

A very "alpha" yet finished project - you will likely die, but you can also win.

Most assets created specifically for the jam. From character to walls/torches.

A few items/clutter, and the final room assets, come from Medieval Dungeon by Infuse Studio
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/a5b6a73fea5340bda9b8ac33d...

Footstep sounds are  taken from:
https://unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/footsteps-sounds-with-bluepri...

Fire Audio - Epic Content.

NOTE: Disable/Exit VR programs as they may cause issues for you. The uploaded version did not have the VR plugin disabled.
